mapper.insert: insert into member_data_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberMobile) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: select * from member_data_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.insert: insert into profile_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, pId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{pId})
mapper.select: select * from member_data_table order by mId desc
mapper.update: update member_data_table set memberName=#{memberName}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile} where mId=#{mId}
